parameters.name: pool_address
parameters.description: Search by (contain) pool address.

parameters.name: token_a_symbol
parameters.description: Search by (contain) token A symbol.

parameters.name: token_b_symbol
parameters.description: Search by (contain) token B symbol.

parameters.name: pool_name
parameters.description: Search by (contain) pool name.

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Search by (contain) creator address.

parameters.name: token_a_mint
parameters.description: Search by (contain) token A mint address.

parameters.name: token_b_mint
parameters.description: Search by (contain) token B mint address.

parameters.name: launchpad
parameters.description: Search by (contain) launchpads.

parameters.name: farm_state
parameters.description: Search by farm state.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Case sensitive search. If true, this will use LIKE condition instead of ILIKE. Default is false.

parameters.name: any
parameters.description:
If true, returns pools match any query conditions.
In other words, this is OR condition. Default is false

parameters.name: tokens_verified
parameters.description: If true, returns only pools with verified tokens.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order by field. Default is tvl.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order direction. Default is ascending.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the number of pools to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip
